content:
Hey all, the Computer Science and Engineering Society (CSES) at UCSD reached out and wants to collaborate on BRL-CAD development. They're currently thinking workshops to introduce students to BRL-CAD projects and dev practices, or partnering on specific student-to-mentor projects where we help mentor them on something.

Who would be interested in supporting this collaboration, and in what capacity? Thought it would be good to get a discussion going here first. If there's anyone from UCSD listening, feel free to chime in as well.
Okay, but they don't need our approval to use BRL-CAD in workshops etc.. If they want commitment, they should explain their expectations.
